description: ISRO is developing a third launchpad at its Sriharikota spaceport to support heavier satellites and next-generation launch vehicles. The facility is expected to be commissioned within four years and will strengthen India’s ability to handle future crewed and uncrewed missions. The expansion reflects ISRO’s long-term plans to scale up launch capacity and infrastructure.
title: ISRO Plans Third Launch Pad at Sriharikota in Four Years to Support Heavier Satellites

description: Scientists have confirmed the most distant supernova ever observed, exploding just 730 million years after the Big Bang. Detected through a powerful gamma-ray burst and later verified by the James Webb Space Telescope, the event offers a rare glimpse of the deaths of the universe’s first stars during the era of reionisation and challenges expectations about early stellar explosions.
title: JWST Spots Most Distant Supernova Ever, From 730 Million Years After Big Bang

description: Scientists developed a new electrochemical method that doubles hydrogen output while lowering energy use by 40 percent. By adding organic molecules and a modified catalyst, the process creates extra hydrogen and useful byproducts, offering a sustainable, efficient path for industrial hydrogen production and potentially transforming clean energy approaches worldwide.
title: New Electrochemical Method Doubles Hydrogen Output While Cutting Energy Costs

description: Americana (2025) is a gripping crime thriller centred on a stolen Native American artefact that triggers chaos in the criminal underworld. Starring Sydney Sweeney and Paul Walter Hauser, the film blends dark humour with suspense and emotional tension. Now available to stream on Prime Video, Americana has received mixed-to-positive reviews, including an approximately 68% critic score on Rotten Tomatoes.
title: Americana (2025) Now Streaming on Prime Video: What To Know About This Darkly Comic Crime Thriller

description: Constable Kanakam Season 2 brings back the suspense-filled Telugu thriller with Varsha Bollamma once again playing the determined constable investigating unexplained disappearances in a rural village. Streaming on ETV Win from 8 January 2026, the new season promises heightened drama, deeper emotional stakes and fresh twists as Kanakam faces hidden dangers and uncovers long-buried secrets.
title: Constable Kanakam Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Fusion energy may have an unexpected cosmic role beyond clean power. A new study suggests fusion reactors could produce axions, hypothetical dark matter particles, when high-energy neutrons from fusion reactions strike reactor walls. These interactions may generate axions that escape shielding undetected. Scientists propose future fusion plants could double as dark matter laboratories, with nearby detectors searching for rare axion signals. Even without detection, such experiments could place important limits on dark matter theories.
title: Fusion Reactors Could Generate Axions, Offering a New Path to Detect Dark Matter

description: A microgravity experiment aboard the International Space Station is helping scientists understand how particles move and cluster without gravity. Conducted inside the station’s laboratory, the study could improve space safety, support future Moon and Mars missions, and deepen understanding of Earth-based processes such as pollution, pollen spread, and ocean dynamics.
title: ISS Microgravity Experiment Reveal How Particles Behave Without Gravity

description: Streaming on Prime Video India, Meant For You brings Turkish romance to global audiences with its heartfelt storytelling and emotional depth. Directed by Hasan Doğan, the 2025 release awaits IMDb ratings as viewership grows.
title: Meant For You (2025) Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About this Turkish Film

description: Motorola Signature launch date in India has been announced and the smartphone will arrive in India soon. The company has now teased its design and key features. Official teasers and a Flipkart microsite reveal a fabric-finished rear panel, a flat display with slim bezels, and a squircle camera module with a periscope telephoto lens. The handset has also appeared on Geekbench, suggesting a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset paired with 16GB RAM and Android 16 support. Leaks further hint at stylus support and a triple 50-megapixel camera setup.
title: Motorola Signature India Launch Date Announced; Company Teases Design, Fabric Finish

description: January is shaping up to be an exciting month for smartphone enthusiasts in India and global markets. Major brands like OnePlus, Realme, Honor, Oppo, and Samsung are lining up their latest launches. OnePlus is readying the Turbo 6 series for the Chinese market, and Realme is preparing the Realme 16 Pro series. Oppo is also set to launch the Reno 15 series in India soon. Here are the smartphones set to launch in January 2026.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in January 2026: OnePlus Turbo 6 Series, Honor Power 2, Realme 16 Pro Series, More

description: Foxconn has scaled its India manufacturing in 2025 with a China-style model that blends vast production campuses with worker ecosystems like housing, healthcare and schools. With a $1.5 billion expansion near Bengaluru and Tamil Nadu and new sites in Greater Noida, Foxconn appears to be diversifying supply chains beyond China.
title: Foxconn’s Manufacturing Expansion in India Is Straight Out of Its China Playbook

description: The outgoing year, 2025, saw multiple tech giants launching their laptops in India. For example, Apple upgraded its MacBook Air and MacBook Pro lineups with the M4 and M5 processors, respectively. Similarly, Acer refreshed its Nitro series, bringing the Nitro V15 (2025) to India. As 2026 is around the corner, which is also expected to see the launches of many laptops in the country, this is the most appropriate time to look back at how 2025 has been.
title: Year Ender 2025: Best Laptops Launched in 2025 Including MacBook Air (2025), Asus Pro Art P16 and More

description: WhatsApp is preparing several new features for 2026, many of which are already appearing in Android and iOS beta updates. These include AI-powered Imagine tools for creative status updates, a username reservation system, advanced chat clearing controls, a strict account security mode, and an @all mention feature for group chats. They highlight WhatsApp’s push toward deeper AI features, tighter privacy and security controls, smarter storage management, and more organised group communication.
title: Year Ender 2025: WhatsApp Features Coming in 2026

description: 2025 was a big year for smartphone photography. With their top-of-the-line camera-centric phones, brands focused heavily on larger sensors, refined telephoto systems, and smarter computational imaging. From iPhone 17 Pro Max and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra to Oppo Find X9 Pro, here are the best camera phones launched in 2025.
title: Gadgets 360 Picks Best Camera Smartphones of 2025: iPhone 17 Pro Max to Xiaomi 15 Ultra

description: Oppo Pad 5 is confirmed to launch in India soon. Oppo confirmed the arrival of the new tablet in the country via Flipkart. The Oppo Pad 5 appears to launch alongside the Reno 15 seres in the country. The tablet is already available in China since October this year. The Indian variant of the tablet confirmed to come with a 10,050mAh battery and a 12.1-inch display.
title: Oppo Pad 5 Will Launch in India Alongside Oppo Reno 15 Series; Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: Written by Suraj Mohanraj, Athibheekara Kaamukan is a Malayalam romance comedy film that stars Lukman Avaran in the lead role. The film explores themes of romance, comedy, self-discovery, and transformation.
title: Athibheekara Kaamukan Streaming Now on Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know About Cast, Crew, Plot, and More

description: The year 2025 proved extraordinary for astronomy, delivering discoveries that stretched from our cosmic backyard to distant galaxies. Scientists tracked Comet 3I/ATLAS, only the third known interstellar object, while nearby stars like Barnard’s Star and Alpha Centauri revealed new planetary companions. On Mars, strange “leopard spots” raised hopes of ancient microbial life.
title: Biggest Space Discoveries in 2025: From New Comets and Black Holes to Sign of Life on Mars

description: Written and directed by Anal Arasu, Phoenix is a Tamil action-drama film that stars Surya Sethupathi in the lead role. The film will begin streaming from Dec 30th, 2025, only on AhaTamil.
title: Phoenix OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Tamil Action-Drama Online

description: Poco M8 5G, which is set to launch in India soon, will be the "slimmest and thinnest" smartphone in its segment, the company claimed recently. In a post on X, the company revealed that the upcoming handset will measure 7.35mm in thickness, while weighing about 178g. The phone will be available for purchase in the country via Flipkart. A dedicated microsite for the Poco M8 5G, which was recently made live, suggests that the handset will feature a dual-tone back panel.
title: Poco M8 5G Design Teased Ahead of India Launch; Confirmed to Sport Slim 7.35mm Profile

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G is set to launch in India, along with the Realme 16 Pro 5G. The two handsets will be available for purchase in the country via Flipkart and the Realme India online store. The dedicated microsite for the Pro+ model has now been updated to confirmed various specifications and features of the upcoming handset, including its chipset, battery, display, and ingress protection ratings. The phone is confirmed to be powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, paired with a 7,000mAh Titan battery.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G Chipset, Display and Other Features Confirmed Ahead of January 6 India Launch

description: Samsung is planning to bring Google Photos to its artificial intelligence (AI)-powered smart TVs next year. The South Korean tech giant announced that it will release the Memories feature in Google Photos to its AI series of smart TVs, allowing users to see a curated list of memories on the big screen.
title: Samsung AI TVs to Bring Google Photos’ Memories Features Next Year

description: Vivo has teased the launch of the Vivo Y31d in Vietnam, confirming its design and durability-focused features. The smartphone will pack a 7,200mAh BlueVolt battery with possible 44W fast charging support. It will carry IP69+ dust and water resistance along with military-grade durability certifications. It will run OriginOS 6 based on Android 16 and may use a Snapdragon 685 chipset. Tipsters suggest a January 2026 launch, with the phone likely skipping an India release.
title: Vivo Y31d Confirmed to Launch Soon With 7,200mAh Battery; Might Not Debut in India, Tipster Claims

description: The OnePlus Turbo 6 series will launch in China soon. The company is currently accepting pre-orders for the phones in China. The listings reveal the colour options and RAM and storage options of the OnePlus Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V. Additionally, a new leak has suggested the price range of the phones.
title: OnePlus Turbo 6, Turbo 6V Price Range Leaked; Company's Website Confirms RAM and Storage Configurations

description: Directed by Razneesh Ghai, 120 Bahadur is an Indian historical war film that revolves around the battle against the Chinese troops to defend against the invasion.
title: 120 Bahadur OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Dial 100 (2024) stands out as a Malayalam suspense thriller that combines emotional depth, moral conflict, and investigative drama. With strong performances and a tense storyline centered around three friends and a tragic incident, the film keeps viewers engaged throughout.
title: Dial 100 Now Available for Streaming Online: Know Everthing About This Malayalam Thriller Drama

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo has been spotted on the Geekbench website with model number V2536A. The listing shows 2,753 points in single-core testing and 8,990 points in multi-core testing. As per the listing, the handset will have a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset under the hood. It could get 14.81GB of RAM and Android 16. The iQOO Z11 Turbo is currently up for pre-orders in China.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset Reportedly Listed on Geekbench

description: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini is scheduled to launch soon in India, along with the Reno 15 and Reno 15 Pro. The handset is confirmed to be equipped with a 6.32-inch AMOLED display, boasting 1.6mm thick bezels. The tech firm has been teasing the specifications and colourways of the upcoming phone for a while. However, its pricing in India remains under wraps. Now, the box price of the handset has surfaced online, hinting at its possible retail price in the country.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini Price in India, Retail Box Price Leaked: Expected Specifications, Features

description: The year-end January sale is now live on PlayStation Store, bringing discounts on PS4 and PS5 games. PlayStation exclusive titles like Death Stranding 2: On the Beach and Astro Bot receive discounts in the sale. New games like Arc Raiders, Dispatch, and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 are discounted, too.
title: PlayStation Store January Sale Best Deals: Arc Raiders, Death Stranding 2, Spider-Man 2 and More

description: Samsung appears to be testing an integration between Bixby and Perplexity for complex queries, spotted on some Galaxy S25 devices running the One UI 8.5 beta. Similar to how Siri leans on ChatGPT and Perplexity for more difficult questions, the integration hints at Samsung experimenting with the company’s answer engine ahead of broader rollouts.
title: Samsung’s Bixby Assistant Might Be Leveraging Perplexity AI to Answer Complex Questions

description: Vivo V70 Elite 5G has reportedly appeared on India’s BIS database, alongside the Vivo Y51 5G, hinting at an imminent launch. The listings follow recent certifications for other Vivo phones, including the Vivo V70, and a device tipped to be the Vivo T5x 5G. The Vivo V70 series is expected to include multiple variants and could debut in India in early 2026. Benchmark and certification listings suggest Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 performance, Android 16, and 5G support for the standard Vivo V70.
title: Vivo V70 Elite 5G Listed on BIS Database Alongside Vivo Y51 5G, Hinting at Imminent Launch in India

description: Vivo X300 Ultra is rumoured to be launched in China early next year as the top-of-the-line model in the flagship X300 series. While the company has yet to confirm the handset’s launch, it has been spotted on a certification website, which hints towards its impending debut in Europe, too. The Vivo X300 Ultra is expected to come with Qualcomm's flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 200-megapixel triple rear camera system.
title: Vivo X300 Ultra Spotted on EEC Certification Site Ahead of China Launch: Expected Specifications

description: OpenAI is hiring a Head of Preparedness to guide its safety strategy as AI models become more capable. The role, based in San Francisco, will lead the technical execution of OpenAI’s Preparedness framework, build threat models and coordinate risk mitigations. The position offers a reported salary of up to $555,000 plus equity and sits within the Safety Systems organisation.
title: OpenAI Looking for a Head of Preparedness to Make AI Models Safer, Offers $500K Plus Equity

description: Samsung will unveil its 2026 home audio lineup at CES 2026 in Las Vegas, showcasing new soundbars and two new Music Studio Wi-Fi speakers. The Music Studio 5 and Music Studio 7 are designed to combine expressive sound with interior-friendly design and can work standalone or with Samsung TVs and soundbars. The lineup also includes updated Q-Series soundbars, led by the HW-Q990H, and a new QS90H all-in-one model, with deeper ecosystem integration through Q-Symphony and SmartThings.
title: Samsung Music Studio 5, Music Studio 7 Wi-Fi Speakers Unveiled Ahead of CES 2026

description: Xiaomi 17 was launched in China in September, along with the Xiaomi 17 Pro and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max. Later, the tech giant also unveiled the Xiaomi 17 Ultra, as the fourth model in the lineup. Now, the Chinese tech giant has confirmed that the Ultra model will be launched in select global markets in 2026. Additionally, a tipster claims that the Xiaomi 17 Ultra and the Xiaomi 17 have been spotted on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) certification website. If this is true, the two handsets could debut in the country in the coming months.
title: Xiaomi 17 Series India Launch Timeline Leaked; Two Handsets Surface on BIS Website Ahead of Debut

description: Honor has officially confirmed that the Honor Power 2 will launch next month in China. The upcoming device is set to be the brand’s largest battery smartphone to date. Teasers reveal that the Honor Power 2 will feature a triple rear camera setup and be available in three colour options. It will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8500 Elite chipset.
title: Honor Power 2 Launch Date Announced; Company Confirms Massive Battery Upgrade

description: Ubisoft has begun rolling back player data after a major breach disrupted Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege, but has not shared a timeline for server restoration. The attack forced a global shutdown after in-game systems were manipulated, causing account issues, in-game economic disruption, and random bans. Ubisoft says the rollback is being handled carefully, followed by extensive quality checks. Servers across PC and consoles remain offline, leaving many players locked out while investigations and system integrity checks continue.
title: Rainbow Six Siege Outage: Ubisoft Brings Severs Online After Massive Backend Breach

description: Earlier this year, Realme showcased a smartphone that packed a 10,000mAh battery. It was a special variant of the Realme GT 7, only meant as a concept device and not a mass-market handset. However, the company is now said to be gearing up to introduce a smartphone with an even bigger capacity. A mystery Realme smartphone has surfaced on a social media website, which packs a 10,001mAh battery.
title: Realme Smartphone With 10,001mAh Battery to Reportedly Launch Soon; Key Specifications Surface

description: Samsung Galaxy A07 5G has been spotted on multiple certification websites recently, hinting at an imminent launch. Its 4G counterpart was unveiled in the Indian market in October, alongside the Galaxy F07 and Galaxy M07. Now, the Galaxy A07 5G has been spotted on the list of supported devices on the Google Play Console. Moreover, the design of the handset has surfaced online. It is expected to pack a 6,000mAh battery, which will be about 1,000mAh larger than the Galaxy A06 5G and the Galaxy A07 4G.
title: Samsung Galaxy A07 5G Design Surfaces on Google Play Console, Could Launch Soon

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series, which is said to include the vanilla Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and Galaxy S26 Ultra, is expected to be launched in global markets, including India, by the South Korean tech giant in February next year. While the purported unveiling of the handsets is weeks away, various specifications, features, and pricing details of the Galaxy S26 lineup have been surfacing online. Now, a report claims that Samsung’s Mobile Experience (MX) division is “struggling” to reduce the manufacturing costs, which indicates that next year’s phones could launch at a higher price.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Could Launch at a Higher Price Due to Rising Component Costs: Report

description: Samsung started rolling out the One UI 8 recently, but smartphone enthusiasts are already curious about Samsung’s next big update — One UI 8.5. The One UI 8.5 beta is reportedly available for the Galaxy Tab S8 and the Galaxy Tab S9 FE. The One UI 8.5 test build was also spotted for the Galaxy Tab S11 series. Samsung is reportedly testing the Galaxy Tab S8 lineup with One UI 8.5 test builds X900XXU9EYL1 and X900OXM9EYL1. Further, user reports suggest that Samsung is internally testing One UI 8.5 for the Galaxy Tab S10 series, Galaxy Tab S10 FE, Galaxy Tab S9 series and Galaxy Tab S9 FE.
title: Samsung Readies One UI 8.5 Beta Update for Galaxy Tab S8, Galaxy Tab S11 Series: Report

description: Vijay Sales has announced its Apple Days Sale in India, offering a range of discounts on the latest iPhone 17, iPhone 16, and iPhone 15 models. The sale, which began on December 28, offers discounted prices on new iPad models, MacBooks, Apple Watches, and AirPods as well. For example, the MacBook Air M4 iPad (2025) are confirmed to see price cuts during the sale. The electronic retail chain has partnered with different lenders to offer payment discounts for customers purchasing Apple products during the sale, which ends on January 4.
title: iPhone 17 Series, iPhone 16, MacBook Air (M4), and More Get Discounts During Vijay Sales Apple Days Sale

description: The OnePlus Turbo 6 series will be launched in China soon, the company has announced. The lineup is confirmed to comprise two models — OnePlus Turbo 6 and OnePlus Turbo 6V. Ahead of the launch, the China-based brand has revealed the design of both upcoming handsets, featuring a square-shaped camera deco. While the OnePlus Turbo 6 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset, the OnePlus Turbo 6V is teased to get a Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC.
title: OnePlus Turbo 6, OnePlus Turbo 6V China Launch Date Announced; Key Specifications Revealed
